description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items include: an economic summit in Williamsburg, a view of Schwetzingen and its castle, noise protection in West Germany, evangelical church congress in Hanover, proteins from mineral oil, a new museum in Monchengladbach and Hamburg's win of the league championship for the second year running.
